scripts.install-server: cd sustainable-select && cd Sustainable-Select-backend && npm install
scripts.start-server: cd sustainable-select && cd Sustainable-Select-backend && node index.js
scripts.install-client: cd sustainable-select && cd Sustainable-Select-frontend && npm install
scripts.build-client: cd sustainable-select && cd Sustainable-Select-frontend && npm run build
scripts.start-client: cd sustainable-select && cd Sustainable-Select-frontend && npm run start
